mapper.select: select sr.* from uaa_user su left join uaa_user_role sur on su.id = sur.user_id left join uaa_role sr on sur.role_id = sr.id where su.user_name = #{userName}
select sp.* from uaa_role sr left join uaa_role_permission srp on sr.id = srp.role_id left join uaa_url_permission sp on srp.permission_id = sp.id where sr.id = = #{roleId}
